description: CSL DualCom GPRS CS2300-R devices with firmware 1.25 through 3.53 use the same 001984 default PIN across different customers' installations, which allows remote attackers to execute commands by leveraging knowledge of this PIN and including it in an SMS message.

description: CSL DualCom GPRS CS2300-R devices with firmware 1.25 through 3.53 allow remote attackers to modify the configuration via a command in an SMS message, as demonstrated by a "4 2" command.

cvss2.cvss2_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-8342

description: Jenkins before 1.587 and LTS before 1.580.1 do not properly ensure trust separation between a master and slaves, which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the master by leveraging access to the slave.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-3665

description: OpenStack Swift-on-File (aka Swiftonfile) does not properly restrict use of the pickle Python module when loading metadata, which allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a crafted extended attribute (xattrs).

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5242

description: OpenStack Ironic Inspector (aka ironic-inspector or ironic-discoverd), when debug mode is enabled, might allow remote attackers to access the Flask console and execute arbitrary Python code by triggering an error.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5306

description: The Fingerprints pages in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive job and build name information via a direct request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5317

description: Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 uses a publicly accessible salt to generate CSRF protection tokens, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass the CSRF protection mechanism via a brute force attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5318

description: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in the create-job CLI command in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted job configuration that is then used in an "XML-aware tool," as demonstrated by get-job and update-job.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5319

description: Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 do not properly verify the shared secret used in JNLP slave connections, which allows remote attackers to connect as slaves and obtain sensitive information or possibly gain administrative access by leveraging knowledge of the name of a slave.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5320

description: The sidepanel widgets in the CLI command overview and help pages in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to the pages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5321

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allows remote attackers to list directory contents and read arbitrary files in the Jenkins servlet resources via directory traversal sequences in a request to jnlpJars/.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5322

description: Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 do not properly restrict access to API tokens which might allow remote administrators to gain privileges and run scripts by using an API token of another user.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5323

description: Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to queue/api.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5324

description: Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allow attackers to bypass intended slave-to-master access restrictions by leveraging a JNLP slave. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-3665.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5325

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the slave overview page in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allows remote authenticated users with certain permissions to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the slave offline status message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-5326

description: The Jenkins CLI subsystem in Jenkins before 1.638 and LTS before 1.625.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted serialized Java object, related to a problematic webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/lib/commons-collections-*.jar file and the "Groovy variant in 'ysoserial'".

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2015-8103
